description:
Configure http.sys, the kernel driver that route HTTP requests to processes, from a nice and simple UI.
More information on usage: https://www.codeproject.com/Articles/437733/Demystify-http-sys-with-HttpSysManager
Features:

* URL reservation management
* Configure SSL bindings (Negotiation, active directory certificate client mapping, revocation check, CTL)
* Create CTLs (Sadly Microsoft removed makectl.exe from circulation, thus the need of this tool), it seems CTL associated to HTTPS endpoint are ignored by IIS, but not on apache.
summary: Configure http.sys, the kernel driver that route HTTP requests to processes, from a nice and simple UI.
author: Nicolas Dorier
